attributes.action: Stop British Citizen Altaf Hussain from threatening people of Pakistan
attributes.additional_details:
We the people of Pakistan, appeal to the british PM to take notice of  Mr. Altaf Hussain (A british citizen who claimed political asylum in the 90's) threatening behavior towards Pakistanis

Mr Hussain has been wanted in different cases in Pakistan, which includes murder, kidnapping, ransom & he still operates through its party which has been labelled a terrorist party in canada.

There is hard evidence of Mr.Altaf's involvement in multiple Murders (He is also under investigation by the   in the murder of Dr. Imran Farooq in London who brutally stabbed to death in London)

Recently Mr Altaf on a live telephone call broadcasted on TV channels threatens the Karachites openly specially to the supporters of Mr. Imran Khan.

PLEASE HELP PAKISTAN by stripping Mr. Altaf Hussain of his british passport and deport him to Pakistan to stand trial in Pakistani courts. Remember this is a test case where millions of pakistani's will be looking forward to your decision.
